import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Routes, Route, Navigate, useMatch } from 'react-router-dom' import BlogList from './components/BlogList' import UserList from './components/UserList' import Notification from './components/Notification' import LoginForm from './components/LoginForm' import Navigation from './components/Navigation' import Home from './components/Home' import UserBlogs from './components/UserBlogs' import BlogInfo from './components/BlogInfo' import { initializeBlogs } from './reducers/blogReducer' import { initializeUsers } from './reducers/userReducer' import { getUser } from './reducers/loginUserReducer' import { Page, Footer } from './style' const App = () => { const { loginUser, blogs } = useSelector((state) => ({ loginUser: state.loginUser, blogs: state.blogs, })) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(initializeBlogs()) }, [dispatch]) useEffect(() => { dispatch(initializeUsers()) }, [dispatch]) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getUser()) }, [dispatch]) const match = useMatch('/blogs/:id') const matchBlog = match ? blogs.find((blog) => blog.id === match.params.id) : null return ( } /> ) : ( ) } /> } /> } /> }> } >
Blog app, Department of Computer Science 2023
) } export default App
